title: Retention of prions in the polychaete Hediste diversicolor and black soldier fly, a Hermetia illucens, larvae after short-term experimental immersion and feeding with brain homogenate from scrapie infected sheep
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Sylvie L. Benestad, Linh Tran, Arne M. Malzahn, Nina S. Liland, Ikram Belghit, Andreas Hagemann
